content:
Verse 1:
I know I hurt you, I can't deny it
I was blinded by my own ego, I couldn't see it
But now I realize, I've been so foolish
I'm sorry for the pain that I caused, oh oh

Chorus:
I'm sorry Lizzo, for all the times I let you down
I'm sorry for the hurt and the sorrow I've found
I'll do better, I'll be there for you now
I'm sorry Lizzo, please forgive me somehow

Verse 2:
I should have listened, I should have been there
But I was caught up in my own affairs
I took you for granted, I let you slip away
But now I see the error of my ways, oh oh

Chorus:
I'm sorry Lizzo, for all the times I let you down
I'm sorry for the hurt and the sorrow I've found
I'll do better, I'll be there for you now
I'm sorry Lizzo, please forgive me somehow

Bridge:
I know I can't take back the past
But I promise to make it right, to make it last
I'll be there for you, through thick and thin
I'm sorry Lizzo, please let me in

Chorus:
I'm sorry Lizzo, for all the times I let you down
I'm sorry for the hurt and the sorrow I've found
I'll do better, I'll be there for you now
I'm sorry Lizzo, please forgive me somehow
